author: Erin La Rosa, Julie Gerstein
title: 36 Songs All Nasty Women Need
text:
And if we missed any songs that belong in the Nasty Woman archive, add them in the comments! ID: 10354330 1. Beyoncé — “Sorry” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=QxsmWxxouIM . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Middle fingers up / Put them hands high / Wave it in his face / Tell ‘em boy bye
ID: 10349726 2. Lesley Gore — “You Don’t Own Me” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=JDUjeR01wnU . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I don’t tell you what to say / Oh, don’t tell you what to do / So just let me be myself / That’s all I ask of you
ID: 10349763 3. M.I.A. — “Bad Girls” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=3Yuqxl284cg . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Accelerating fast I could do this in a second / Looking in the rear view swagger going swell / Leaving boys behind cause it’s legal just to kill
ID: 10349828 4. Meredith Brooks — “Bitch” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=_ivt_N2Zcts . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: So take me as I am / This may mean / You’ll have to be a stronger man
ID: 10349740 5. Christina Aguilera — “Can’t Hold Us Down” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=dg8QgUIKXHw . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: This is for my girls all around the world / Who have come across a man that don’t respect your worth / Thinkin’ all women should be seen and not heard / So what do we do girls, shout out loud
ID: 10349754 6. Janelle Monáe featuring Erykah Badu — “Q.U.E.E.N.” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=tEddixS-UoU . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Am I a freak for dancing around? / Am I a freak for getting down? / I’m cutting up, don’t cut me down / Yeah I wanna be, wanna be Queen
ID: 10349816 7. Lily Allen — “Hard Out Here” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=E0CazRHB0so . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: You’ll find me in the studio and not in the kitchen / I won’t be braggin’ ‘bout my cars or talkin’ ‘bout my chains / Don’t need to shake my ass for you ‘cause I’ve got a brain
ID: 10349771 8. Dolly Parton — “Just Because I’m a Woman” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=lz_ejQbDoS0 . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Yes I’ve made my mistakes / But listen and understand / My mistakes are no worse than yours / Just because I’m a woman
ID: 10349781 9. Kelis — “Caught Out There” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=N3JFwd1bk4Q . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: This song is for all the women out there / That been lied to by their men / And I know you all been lied to / Over and over again
ID: 10349810 10. Whitney Houston — “It’s Not Right, But It’s Okay” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=6J538b-OLRU . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Things are gonna change / ‘Cause I won’t be your fool anymore / That’s why you have to leave / So don’t turn around to see my face / There’s no more tears left here for you to see
ID: 10349841 11. Peaches — “Boys Wanna Be Her” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=qcKMg7eEjj8 . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: The way you rock, don’t stop / Girl, you got the chops / Flip flop / She bop / Self-taught / You lick so hot
ID: 10349861 12. No Doubt — “Just a Girl” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=PHzOOQfhPFg . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: ‘Cause I’m just a girl, little ol’ me / Well don’t let me out of your sight / Oh, I’m just a girl, all pretty and petite / So don’t let me have any rights / Oh, I’ve had it up to here!
ID: 10349874 13. Tegan and Sara — “Proud” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=BPAT4k7ltxY . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Freedom and blood / I make my mark and fight for tomorrow / Finally I’ve got something / Something I can raise my voice for
ID: 10349893 14. Jenny Lewis — “Just One of the Guys” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=Irvcf6dCk-k . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: No matter how hard I try to be just one of the guys / There’s a little something inside that won’t let me / No matter how hard I try to have an open mind / There’s a little voice inside that prevents me
ID: 10349903 15. Helen Reddy — “I Am Woman” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=Zu4xpDuf84A . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I am woman, hear me roar / In numbers too big to ignore / And I know too much to go back an’ pretend / ‘Cause I’ve heard it all before / And I’ve been down there on the floor / No one’s ever gonna keep me down again
ID: 10349922 16. Aretha Franklin — “Do Right Woman, Do Right Man” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=TE5j9wVPeLQ . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: A woman’s only human / You should understand / She’s not just a play thing / She’s flesh and blood just like her man
ID: 10349932 17. Madonna — “Human Nature” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=XTSrV_0vG-4 . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: And I’m not sorry (I’m not sorry) / It’s human nature (it’s human nature) / And I’m not sorry (I’m not sorry) / I’m not your bitch don’t hang your shit on me
ID: 10349950 18. Marina and The Diamonds — “Can’t Pin Me Down” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=Wsi2xvbTwQw . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Time to back off, motherfucker / Do you really want me to write a feminist anthem / I’m happy cooking dinner in the kitchen for my husband
ID: 10349960 19. Salt-N-Pepa — “None of Your Business” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=_Q96-e042bk . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: If I want to take a guy home with me tonight / It’s none of your business / And she want to be a freak and sell it on the weekend / It’s none of your business
ID: 10349988 20. Joan Jett — “Bad Reputation” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=5RAQXg0IdfI . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I don’t give a damn ‘bout my reputation / You’re living in the past it’s a new generation / A girl can do what she wants to do and that’s / What I’m gonna do
ID: 10349995 21. Janet Jackson — “Nasty” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=dSLz0YYsJHA . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: No my first name ain’t baby / It’s Janet / Miss Jackson if you’re nasty
ID: 10349998 22. Jennifer Lopez — “Ain’t Your Mama” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=Pgmx7z49OEk . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I ain’t gon’ be cooking all day, I ain’t your mama / I ain’t gon’ do your laundry, I ain’t your mama / I ain’t your mama, boy, I ain’t your mama / When you’re gon’ get your act together? / I ain’t your mama
ID: 10350019 23. Sleater-Kinney — “Anonymous” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=3liZUTVC2fE . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Feel safe, inside, inside those well drawn lines / Boyfriend, a car, a job, my white girl life / She swallowed the spider to catch, to catch that fly / But I don’t know why, why she swallowed that lie
ID: 10354169 24. Bikini Kill — “Feels Blind” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=69lhDIqeHcI . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I’m the woman I was taught to always be: hungry / Yeah women are well acquainted with thirst / Well, I could eat just about anything / We might even eat your hate up like love
ID: 10354191 25. 7 Year Bitch — “Dead Men Don’t Rape” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=qoHYvxPMmUE . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I don’t have pity not a single tear / For those who get joy from a woman’s fear / I’d rather get a gun and just blow you away / Then you’ll learn first hand / Dead men don’t rape
ID: 10354199 26. Gossip — “Fire with Fire” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=uq_tZXUeqJQ . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Now, it ain’t the end of the world girl / You’ll find your place in the world girl / All you gotta do is stand up and fight fire with fire
ID: 10354212 27. MUNA — “Loudspeaker” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=fidPIcruCro . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: What you’ve done to me / Well I’ve seen many a friend be silenced / Thinking nobody would believe them / Well baby you’ve got another thing coming / You can try to make me stop, call it delusion / But every time I don’t shut up, it’s revolution
ID: 10354228 28. Metric — “Glass Ceiling” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=ypBq2YW9RC4 . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Only know what I’m told, only know what I’m told / Fast asleep daydreaming / Start to push, break your own glass ceiling / Can’t count, can’t catch the pieces falling
ID: 10354243 29. Laura Jane Grace — “True Trans Soul Rebel” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=b0GOI-Uhqec . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Who’s gonna take you home tonight? / Who’s gonna take you home? / Does god bless your transsexual heart / True Trans Soul Rebel?
ID: 10354255 30. Lion Babe — “Jump Hi” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=aHqsE2EOpJE . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Yeah, we finally made it / You know they hate it / I swear to God / Knowing just what you are / Made you into a star
ID: 10354263 31. Joseph — “White Flag” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=el1QWfnYy_c . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I’ll be an army, no you’re / Not gonna stop me getting through / I’ll sing a marching song and / Stomp through the halls louder than you
ID: 10354278 32. Lizzo — “Worship” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=KN_na84b9ik . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: Hands to the sky, show me that you’re mine / And baby, worship me / Worship me / On your knees / Patiently, quietly, faithfully, worship me
ID: 10354289 33. Spice Girls — “Wannabe” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=gJLIiF15wjQ . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: If you want my future, forget my past / If you wanna get with me, better make it fast / Now don’t go wasting my precious time / Get your act together we could be just fine
ID: 10354306 34. Empress Of — “Woman Is a Word” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=OZbwTrrJkhc . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: I’m only a struggle if I get in your way / You made the road / Made the road one-way
ID: 10354326 35. Pat Benatar — “Hit Me With Your Best Shot” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=0JRgHol94Xc . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: You come on with it, come on / You don’t fight fair / That’s okay, see if I care / Knock me down, it’s all in vain / I get right back on my feet again
ID: 10356135 36. Aretha Franklin and the Eurythmics — “Sisters Are Doing It for Themselves” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=VtUWs6muGzg . youtube.com Key nasty lyrics: So we’re comin’ out of the kitchen / ‘Cause there’s somethin’ we forgot to say to you / We said, “Sisters are doin’ it for themselves” / Standin’ on their own two feet / And ringin’ on their own bells
ID: 10349971 View this embed ›
ID: 10357176 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
